DataElement.preferredName: Prior Radiation Therapy Locally Administered Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the prior radiation therapy was localized and not to the sole site of evaluable disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior radiation therapy administered locally.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: To a restricted area (of the body).:Given.

Concepts.definition: To a restricted area (of the body).
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was prior radiation therapy l
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was prior radiation therapy localized and not to the sole site of evaluable disease

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any local palliative irradiation (small port) at least 4 weeks prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any local palliative irradiation (small port) at least 14 days prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a minimum of 54 Gy focal irradiation administered over approximately 42 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received no local palliative irradiation or craniospinal irradiation?

DataElement.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Therapy Ind-2 2018279v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
